input_email_body:
Subject: Required Assistance for Smartsheet and PostgreSQL Integration

I am writing to request documentation that guides the integration of Smartsheet with PostgreSQL for investment analytics You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. Could you provide me with any pertinent resources or instructions that would assist me in beginning this integration? I would greatly appreciate any information you can offer regarding this issue My name is Liu Wei.. Thank you for your time and support.
